description:
Prep your hands for hard days of skin abuse. The Performance Cream skin conditioner helps with skin elasticity and durability, and contains a small percentage of anti-persperant to reduce hand sweat. Great for keeping skin in climbing shape on trips or for those with particularly sweaty skin.

  • Ingredients: water, grapeseed oil, honey, stearic acid, emulsifying wax, peppermint oil, rosemary oil, methenamine, tea tree oil, lavender, thyme oil, willow bark, menthol
name: Rhino Skin Solutions Performance Cream
